author: G Jayachandraraj
title: Free moon sign vedic astrology daily predictions | Onmanorama
text:
Your form is submitted successfully. Recipient's Mail:* ( For more than one recipient, type addresses seperated by comma ) Your Name:* Your Comment: Enter the letters from image : 
When is a good time to seek your goals? Is it time to lie low? Here’s your zodiac prediction for the day. 
Aries 
Meda kooru (Stars: Aswathi , Bharani and Karthika 1/4) 
You are not out of the woods yet but there is a silver lining on the horizon. You may be faced with setbacks and you may be left restless for some reason or the other. You are not in the pink of health. However, you can expect to be successful in all your endeavors after the twilight hour. Your efforts may be recognized and you may end the day on a happy note. 
Taurus 
Edava kooru (Stars: Karthika 3/4, Rohini and Makeeriyam 1/2) 
You will do best to keep away from unnecessary adventures. You can expect delays in whatever you take up today. You may be faced with setbacks and you may be left restless for some reason or the other. However, you can expect to be successful in all your endeavors after the twilight hour. Your efforts may be recognized and you may end the day on a happy note. 
Gemini 
Midhuna kooru (Stars: Makeeriyam 1/2, Thiruvathira and Punartham 3/4) 
Arise and shine, so the stars tell you. Your perseverance has paid. You can expect grand success in all your endeavors and even expect to climb up the career ladder. You will find yourself happy and contended. Your wishes may be granted. 
Cancer 
Karkidaka kooru (Stars: Punartham 1/4, Pooyam and Ayiliyam) 
Your fortunes are changing for the worse, You may be faced with failures and your pride may take a beating. You can expect to incur losses and you may be disturbed for some reason of he other. Do not lose heart though. You are expected to have a better time after the twilight hour. 
Leo 
Chinga kooru (Stars: Makam, Pooram and Uthram 1/4) 
Your fortunes are changing for the better. Stars are on your side. Your health is on the mend. Your endeavors will be successful. Your travels may be rewarding as they are likely to meet with their intended purposes. You can even look forward to a sumptuous feast. Bon appetit. 
Virgo 
Kanni kooru (Stars: Utharam 3/4, Atham and Chithira 1/2) 
Caution is the magic word today. You are likely to be disappointing on many fronts. You may be frustrated by setbacks and you may be sent on a wild goose chase in search of that elusive goal. Your expenses may shoot up. Do not lose heart though. You can expect a reprieve towards the evening. 
Libra 
Thula kooru (Stars: Chithira 1/2, Choythi and Visakam 3/4) 
You are on a roll. You can expect your plans to be successful and you can even look forward to catching up with family members. You can expect a windfall gain and even a promotion at workplace. Your wishes may be granted. You are in the pink of health. 
Scorpio 
Virchika kooru (Stars: Visakam1/4, Anizham and Thriketta) 
Your perseverance has paid. Arise and shine, so the stars tell you. You are expected to make much headway in your plans. You are going places as far as your work is concerned. Your dreams may come true and your travels may be rewarding as they are likely to meet with their intended purposes. You are expected to receive a windfall. 
Sagittarius 
Dhanu kooru (Stars: Moolam, Pooradam and Uthiradam 1/4) 
You have seen far better days. You can be prepared for setbacks and a general sense of unease. You may be nagged by ailments. Gastric troubles may be a particular irritant. Do not lose heart though. You can look forward to having a better time after the twilight hour. 
Capricorn 
Makara kooru (Stars: Uthiradam 3/4, Thiruvonam and Avittam 1/2) 
Caution is the magic word today for it is downhill time for you. Your plans may be foiled and you may be haunted by a fear of accidents. You can also expect to incur a loss in the late afternoon. Do not lose heart though. You can look forward to a better time towards the evening. 
Aquarius 
Kumba kooru (Stars: Avittam 1/2, Chathayam and Pooruttathi 3/4) 
Happy days are here to stay. Your endeavors are likely to be successful and you can expect to fatten your coffers. Your dreams may come true and your travels may be rewarding. You can look forward to a gala time with your buddies. 
Pisces 
Meena kooru (Stars: Pooruttathi 1/4, Uthiruttathi and Revathi) 
Your perseverance has paid. Arise and shine, so the stars tell you. You are likely to excel in races while your opponents may see their positions weakening. Your endeavors may be successful and your wishes may be granted. ×
